Package cscd212classes.factories

Class LifeFormFactory

java.lang.Object
cscd212classes.factories.LifeFormFactory
public class LifeFormFactory extends Object
The LifeFromFactory class creates the appropriate LifeForm using the Factory Method Design Pattern
All Parameters will be passed as final and all preconditions will be met

    This method creates the appropriate life form by calling the appropriate constructor and passing the correct parameters It checks the life form type and depending on which life form type creates a new LifeForm object.

  • Method Details

    • getLifeForm

      public static LifeForm getLifeForm(LifeFormType lifeFormType, String name, int currentLifePoints)
      This method creates the appropriate life form by calling the appropriate constructor and passing the correct parameters It checks the life form type and depending on which life form type creates a new LifeForm object.
      HINT: this is a series of ifs or if/elses what should be the default life form
      Parameters:
      lifeFormType - The enumerated type representing the life form
      name - The name of the life form
      currentLifePoints - The current life points of the life form
      Returns:
      LifeForm Representing the appropriate object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or empty or currentLifePoints is less than 1

    • getLifeForm

      public static LifeForm getLifeForm(LifeFormType lifeFormType)
      This method creates the appropriate life form by calling the other get life form method and passing it the default values for the name and the current life points
      Parameters:
      lifeFormType - The enumerated type representing the life form
      Returns:
      LifeForm Representing the appropriate object to be built
